surface_layer.definition: The process of bouncing back electromagnetic waves from a surface.

deep_layer.mechanism: Occurs when electromagnetic waves encounter a surface with a different refractive index.
deep_layer.origin: A fundamental property of wave propagation.

examples: Reflection of light from a mirror
Reflection of radio waves from a metal surface
